citation.title: Solution structure of human translationally controlled tumor protein.

comment.text: Involved in calcium binding and microtubule stabilization.

Found in several healthy and tumoral cells including erythrocytes, hepatocytes, macrophages, platelets, keratinocytes, erythroleukemia cells, gliomas, melanomas, hepatoblastomas, and lymphomas. It cannot be detected in kidney and renal cell carcinoma (RCC). Expressed in placenta and prostate.
Down-regulated in response to enterovirus 71 (EV71) infection.

property.value: Expressed in urethra and 258 other tissues
P:negative regulation of intrinsic apoptotic signaling pathway in response to DNA damage
